feed.title: I Love .NET
feed.subtitle: This is a .NET knowledge sharing platform with live demos crafted by developers for developers with love.

entry.title: Blazor WASM Two-Factor Authentication with QR Codes and ASP.NET Identity
entry.summary: In this article let's learn how to implement two-factor authentication (2FA) with QR codes and TOTP in Blazor WebAssembly Standalone applications using ASP.NET Core Identity. All with live working demo.
entry.content: In this article let's learn how to implement two-factor authentication (2FA) with QR codes and TOTP in Blazor WebAssembly Standalone applications using ASP.NET Core Identity. All with live working demo.

entry.title: Blazor WASM Standalone Authentication with ASP.NET Identity

entry.content: In this article let's learn how to implement cookie-based authentication in Blazor WebAssembly Standalone applications using ASP.NET Core Identity. All with live working demo.

entry.title: Building AI Chat Applications in .NET with Microsoft.Extensions.AI
entry.summary: In this post I will teach you how to build production-ready AI chat applications in .NET using Microsoft.Extensions.AI and OllamaSharp, proving that AI development belongs in C# just as much as Python. All with live working demo.
entry.content: In this post I will teach you how to build production-ready AI chat applications in .NET using Microsoft.Extensions.AI and OllamaSharp, proving that AI development belongs in C# just as much as Python. All with live working demo.

entry.title: Avoiding Cache Stampede and Handling Nulls in .NET
entry.summary: In this post, I will teach you how to prevent cache stampede attacks, implement proper GetOrSet patterns, and handle null values in cache to protect your application from DOS attacks and database overload. All with practical examples.
entry.content: In this post, I will teach you how to prevent cache stampede attacks, implement proper GetOrSet patterns, and handle null values in cache to protect your application from DOS attacks and database overload. All with practical examples.

entry.title: Understanding Caching Fundamentals in .NET
entry.summary: In this post, I will teach you the fundamentals of caching in .NET - what it is, when to use it, and how to implement effective caching strategies that dramatically improve application performance. All with practical examples and best practices.
entry.content: In this post, I will teach you the fundamentals of caching in .NET - what it is, when to use it, and how to implement effective caching strategies that dramatically improve application performance. All with practical examples and best practices.

entry.title: Specification Pattern - Eliminating Scattered Business Logic in DDD

entry.content: In this post I will teach you how to eliminate scattered and duplicated business logic using the Specification Pattern from Domain-Driven Design. All with live working demo.

entry.title: Database Normalization
entry.summary: Master the art of database normalization to eliminate wasteful determinism and build rock-solid data foundations. Learn all five normal forms with practical examples.
entry.content: Master the art of database normalization to eliminate wasteful determinism and build rock-solid data foundations. Learn all five normal forms with practical examples.

entry.title: Add MCP to Existing .NET REST Endpoints
entry.summary: Learn how to add Model Context Protocol (MCP) capabilities to your existing ASP.NET Core REST APIs, enabling AI agents and chatbots to interact with your backend systems seamlessly.
entry.content: Learn how to add Model Context Protocol (MCP) capabilities to your existing ASP.NET Core REST APIs, enabling AI agents and chatbots to interact with your backend systems seamlessly.

entry.title: Mastering Advanced JSON with Custom Converters and Source Generation in .NET
entry.summary: Take full control of JSON serialization with custom converters (basic and factory patterns) and boost performance with System.Text.Json source generation.
entry.content: Take full control of JSON serialization with custom converters (basic and factory patterns) and boost performance with System.Text.Json source generation.

entry.title: Handling JSON Errors and Best Practices in .NET
entry.summary: Master JSON error handling with JsonException, custom exceptions, circular references, immutable types, and polymorphic serialization for robust .NET applications.
entry.content: Master JSON error handling with JsonException, custom exceptions, circular references, immutable types, and polymorphic serialization for robust .NET applications.

entry.title: Maximizing JSON Performance with Utf8JsonReader and Utf8JsonWriter in .NET

entry.content: Achieve blazing-fast JSON processing with low-level Utf8JsonReader and Utf8JsonWriter APIs for maximum performance and minimal memory allocation.

entry.title: Creating and Modifying JSON Using JsonNode in .NET

entry.title: Improve Security with Dependency Management and SBOM in .NET
